common.entities.players

Class PlayerGame

  • Object
    • Actor
      • Group
        • GameActor
          • GameActorAnimation
            • PlayerGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    InputAdapter, InputProcessor, Cullable

    public class PlayerGame
extends GameActorAnimation
implements InputAdapter
    Cette classe permet de déplacer le joueur et d'actionner son animation
    Since:
    5.0
    Version:
    6.1
    Author:
    Jorys-Micke ALAÏS, Louka DOZ, Loic SENECAT, Quentin RAMSAMY-AGEORGES
    See Also:
    GameActorAnimation
